AI Description: Leptonica is an open-source image processing and image analysis library. It provides a wide range of image processing functions and is used for tasks such as image enhancement, binarization, morphology, and more. Leptonica is written in C and provides bindings for various programming languages.
Core Features: Image Processing Functions, Image Analysis Tools, Support For Various Image Formats, Advanced Image Manipulation Techniques, Integration With Other Programming Languages
General Tags: Image Processing, Image Analysis, Open-Source, Library, C
